actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the retirement provisions of title 5, United States Code, to include as creditable service for purposes of the civil service retirement system certain periods of public-school service outside of the Canal Zone by individuals who become subject to such provisions for public-school service within the Canal Zone.

summary.text: Permits public school teachers in the Canal Zone up to ten years' credit for civil service retirement purposes for service in public schools in the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the retirement provisions of title 5, United States Code, to include as creditable service for purposes of the civil service retirement system certain periods of public-school service outside of the Canal Zone by individuals who become subject to such provisions for public-school service within the Canal Zone.
